title: Senior Director of Information Technologies & HIPPA Security Officer
description:
Demonstrates leadership and strong business acumen in the determination of strategic IT objectives for an industry-leading firm dedicated to the delivery of pharmacy-related consulting solutions. Entrusted to handle the resource allocation and budgeting activities for three teams of software engineering professionals in different geographical locations.
  • Implemented a development process and assembled a team of engineers to build internal applications using SCRUM and DevOps principles.
  • Chief coordinator of a wide array of activities required to achieve HITRUST Certification status, including the development and implementation of strict policies and procedures.
  • Project leader for a massive effort that successfully integrated the IT infrastructure and hardware from two independent companies into a Microsoft Azure environment.

projects.description: Chief oversight of a wide spectrum of efforts associated with obtaining a key strategic objective.  The HITRUST CSF certification is a comprehensive security framework used by healthcare organizations that handle sensitive data - An achievement that significantly improved the company’s competitive position in the market.  Lead a team of professionals in the implementation of a multitude of security control measures along with business processes to achieve the certification.

Guided a team of internal and 3rd party contractors in a company-wide Azure migration effort that eliminated three inefficient Microsoft SQL servers and poorly-performing processing services with an entirely new Azure cloud infrastructure that included virtual networks with VPN access, new SQL servers as infrastructure, and innovatively designed Azure Web Applications.  Applied expertise in utilizing Azure Data Factory to extract, transform, and load into SQL databases for processing by the company’s internal applications.

title: Senior Agile Coach & Manager
description:
Contributed expertise extensively through a multitude of roles and projects including conducting numerous Agile training courses for internal and external clients, designing innovative courseware, public speaking events on technical topics, facilitation of meetings and the mentoring of new coaches and technical trainers.

Served as an Agile coach on numerous occasions guiding organizations in the transformation and implementation of Scrum and Kanban along with DevOps principles and practices. Successfully facilitated the professional growth of other coaches in the practice. Gained extensive experience in sales engineering and in the management of profit and loss (P&L).

projects.title: Agile Coach
projects.description: Trispet Solutions was undergoing an agile transformation and culture shift in order to deliver products to the market earlier and increase quality. As a coach in this organization I helped them see the value of delivering sooner. I also guided them in ways to shift towards newer technologies that would allow them to continue to deliver value and avoid the need to completely stop to do a rewrite.

projects.title: Dojo Sensei
projects.description: I helped facilitate an intensive instruction and coaching session called a Dojo. Teams would enter in groups and spend two weeks immersed in a space reserved for learning and experimentation, while honing their agility skills and addressing problems specific to their technology and their place in the company. As Sensei, I guided them through this process of self-discovery, and suggested technological suggestions.

projects.title: Agile Coach
projects.description: Coached and trained Husco's IT department in visualizing their work through Kanban, stream lined their work intake process, and coached them through a continuous improvement mindset.

projects.title: DevOps Consultent
projects.description: Played a key role in establishing a Continuous Delivery and Integration pipeline at Northwestern Mutual.  Guided the company in envisioning and engineering a pipeline capable of supporting the wide array of technologies utilized by the company.  A significant component that contributed to the success of this project involved special customization to support the compliance requirements of the company, as well as the massive number of products that would be affected.

projects.title: Agile Coach
projects.description: I coached and trained them in Kanban and Scrum to help them streamline there development process and visualize there work.  In doing so they were able to better meet their customers demands.

projects.title: DevOps Consultent
projects.description: I helped coach and build a Continuous Delivery and Integration pipeline.  Worked with both the developers and network administrators at KeHE while building the pipeline.  Trained the developers in modern development techniques that complement being in a Continues Delivery and Intergration pipeline.

projects.title: Agile Coach
projects.description: Helped Northwestern Mutual through their Agile transformation process through teaching multiple different training courses surrounding agility and coaching teams, individuals, and their stakeholders through the changes that agility brings to the table. Through this agile coaching role, I have acted as a mentor, coach, trainer and a facilitator in order to demonstrate, educate, and help those I have been coaching take ownership of their work.

title: Senior Software Consultant
description: I worked as a software developer helping orginizations build custom solutions.

projects.title: Senior Software Developer
projects.description: While at Direct Supply, I worked on developing an ecommerce solution.  My focus on this project was new feature development, mentoring team members, spreading new ideas outside the team, and modifying existing development practices to better suit the needs of the company.  I was instrumental in ensuring team members were using test driven development, continuous integration, and continuous delivery practices.

projects.title: Senior Software Developer
projects.description: While working with Henry Schein, I was focused on a web application for sharing products through social media.  Along with the development of the product I was also responsible for gathering and understanding requirements and working with the client to prioritize the work.  I also helped the client with implementing a continuous integration solution to better suit their needs.

title: Senior Software Developer & Team Lead
description: Provided software development expertise and team leadership skills mentoring individuals in the application of S.O.L.D principles and modern development practices.  Guided many organizations in the implementation of Scrum and DevOps principles and practices.

projects.title: Senior Software Developer
projects.description: While at DentaQuest, I worked on a service that took in EDI documents in XML format and transfored them in to objects that where then passed into another service.

projects.title: Senior Software Developer & Team Lead
projects.description: While at Badger Meter, I worked on a web application that was used to collect and manage meter information.  The usage information from meters was feed into a billing system and invoices were generated for customers.  Additionally, the meter usage information was used to generate reports that showed consumption data and trends.  While on this project, I acted in a dual role of Team Lead and Architect.  I was responsible for working through requirements and ensuring that the development team had a clear understanding and implemented the feature correctly.  I also helped the team move to adoption of the Scrum framework with the goal of developing a better product for the client, business stakeholders, and engagement of the development team.

title: Software Developer
description: Gained excellent Scrum framework experience while playing a supporting role on a team of exceptional software developers.  Successfully introduced and integrated Scrum practices within the company while rewriting company products with modern technology.

title: Web Developer & Network Administrator
description: Built strong foundation of applicable IT support skills via the administration of network support, including file server maintenance and help desk responsibilities.  Cultivated HTML and website design skills by assisting in the design of the company’s website.
